description.p:
Yum Extender is a gui for package management, it will allow you to search and browse for packages to install, remove & update on your computer.
It is designed to give you full control over the packages on your computer and to be used by all users.

ul.li: Browse packages available for installation or update
Browse packages installed on your computer
Search packages by name, summary, description
Watch the history of package action on your sytem
Browse packages by different categories like Size, Repository
Control want package repositories there is enabled for current session
